title: 2/24/22 DPS Best Of - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 2/24/22 DPS Best Of - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
description:
C & R talk Tom Brady's comedy away from Belichick, Love Is Blind during NFL blues, LeBron controlling where his son Bronny goes (along with calls from across the country.) Plus, the fellas discuss Kyrie's 'Covid chicken,' with an "appearance" from Patrick Mahomes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
